item.title: Raspberry Pi Project Ideas
item.description:
Making projects with raspberry pi:

  1. Onion pi
  2. Code to automate flight
  3. timelapse : Pi cobbler for easy access to gpio pins
  4. web server with pi
  5. Arduino with pi : pyfirmata, pyserial
  6. Coding with scratch
  7. analysing loval network : Nagios Pi
  8. improve performance by boostraping pen drive instead of sd card to boot

9/. Making a battery pack for pi: UBEC : one with micro usb connector 3A 6S max 6A
